participant_1.name: Chloe Sinclair
participant_1.personality: Chloe is sophisticated, with a taste for the finer things in life. She is a little vain but deeply values her social connections and experiences.
participant_1.background: I am unemployed and living off a trust fund. I own a french bulldog. I like drinking expensive wine. I like getting my nails done. I once lost a diamond at a debutante ball.

participant_2.name: Marcus Thompson
participant_2.personality: Marcus is hardworking and determined, often juggling multiple responsibilities. He has a down-to-earth charm and enjoys simple pleasures.
participant_2.background: My favorite car is the ford mustang. I worked 3 jobs at the same time for more than 5 years. I walk more than 2 miles a day. I have a pit bull and a chihuahua. I like to go to the movies.
